<h2 style="margin-top: 66px;">References</h2>

<p>Baloch, S.H., Krim, H. and Genton, M.G., 2005, July. Robust independent component analysis. <i>In Statistical Signal Processing</i>, 2005 IEEE/SP 13th Workshop on (pp. 61-64). IEEE.
<br /><br />
Hyvärinen, Aapo, and Erkki Oja. 2000. “Independent Component Analysis: Algorithms and Applications.” <i>Neural Networks</i> 13 (4-5). Elsevier: 411–30.
<br /><br />
Miettinen, Jari, Katrin Illner, Klaus Nordhausen, Hannu Oja, Sara Taskinen, and Fabian J Theis. 2016. “Separation of Uncorrelated Stationary Time Series Using Autocovariance Matrices.” <i>Journal of Time Series Analysis</i> 37 (3). Wiley Online Library: 337–54.
<br /><br />
Miettinen, Jari, Klaus Nordhausen, and Sara Taskinen. 2017. “Blind Source Separation Based on Joint Diagonalization in R: The Packages Jade and Bssasymp.” <i>Journal of Statistical Software</i> 76. Foundation for Open Access Statistics.
<br /><br />
Virta, J. and Nordhausen, K., 2017. Blind source separation of tensor-valued time series. <i>Signal Processing</i>, 141, pp.204-216.
<br /><br />
Yeredor, Arie. 2003. “TV-Sobi: An Expansion of Sobi for Linearly Time-Varying Mixtures.” In Proc. <i>4th International Symposium on Independent Component Analysis and Blind Source Separation</i> (Ica’03), Nara, Japan.</p>
